channel.title: How do you make a event random:: in thieving?
channel.description: I want to make steal from npcs, how would i make it random for it, Like not everytime they will get something and if they dont get something they get hit and npc attacks them

item.title: How do you make a event random:: in thieving?
item.dc:creator: @IAsk IAsk
item.description:
@IAsk wrote:

Hi,
That code is usually already in thieving. It’s in Testscape. Most of the people on this forum use a modified Testscape. Just search, “Robman” In client.java. Then change that around, below that there should be “Robmanfail”, Just alter the “Random();” Bit in there.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make a event random:: in thieving?
